name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Developer with 13+ years of experience proficient in **.NET**, **C#**, **Web API**, **SQL**, **PostgreSQL**, **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, **React**, **Angular**, **AWS**, and CI/CD practices. Proven track record in building and maintaining robust, high-performance applications in dynamic environments. Skilled in developing **NestJS** applications and implementing deployment pipelines that enhance productivity and reliability. 
Expert in Agile methodologies and DevOps principles, fostering seamless collaboration and communication across teams. Strong mentoring abilities that empower junior developers through knowledge sharing and support. Additionally, equipped with extensive experience in the healthcare and financial industries, including implementing compliance-driven solutions aligned with HIPAA and PCI DSS standards, and building AI/ML-powered platforms with **React**, **Python**, and **FastAPI**.
